name: Formula Pixel [Alpha]
description:
V0.01 of Formula P Alpha Test! Hopefully it works smooth, but please let me know any bugs you find! Whether its the game breaking or times not registering properly please send me a message on discord to let me know!

Known issues so far:

- Resolution/Aspect Ratio might not be scaling properly. If this is the case, a quick solution is resizing your browser window. Sorry for the inconvenience, I'm working on it!
